name: Penerimaan Purchase Order
query:
SELECT
	poi.parent as "Purchase Order:Link/Purchase Order:140",
	group_concat(poi.item_name separator ',')   as "Item Name::220",
	SUM(poi.qty) as "Qty:Float:120",
	pri.received_qty as "Qty Datang:Float:120",
	pri.qty as "Qty Diterima:Float:120",
	pri.rejected_qty as "Qty Ditolak:Float:120"
FROM
	`tabPurchase Order Item` poi
LEFT JOIN (SELECT 
    SUM(pri.received_qty) received_qty, 
    SUM(pri.qty) qty, 
    SUM(pri.rejected_qty) rejected_qty, 
    pri.purchase_order, 
    pri.item_code FROM `tabPurchase Receipt Item` pri 
    WHERE pri.docstatus = 1
    GROUP BY pri.purchase_order) pri 
        ON pri.purchase_order = poi.parent
WHERE
	poi.docstatus = 1
GROUP BY
	poi.parent
ORDER BY
	"Total Commission:Currency:120"
